title: If you dodge in nemesis
body:
the game mode should be permanently disabled on your account. The entire point is to play dumb comps and champions. If you want to be a hero on your main, play another mode derp

Currently on my 3rd attempt to create a game in the ban/pick/trade menu

replies.body: Well I got a game. Got azir. Did pretty poorly. Got a page of bm from both teams. Why don't I uninstall is beyond me sometimes. I actually waited 30 minutes to be verbally abused for 20 minutes because I fed, in a game mode where people are supposed to just have fun

Welcome to league.

Was it a talliyah and illaoi that flamed you?
No, it was janna lulu on their team and on my team karthus syndra

I love Nemesis just for this reason.  Lost horribly my first 2 games, but second two games I was given mains (thankfully) and won easily.  But all-in-all I had fun, even though people were whining about champions the game was still fun.
when they give the enemy 4 tanks and we have 4 supports and i'm adc urgot nah bye felicia wet noodle fight is never fun
wet noodle fight is the reality of game modes where you pick dumb champs with dumb team comps for fun. how about dont waste peoples queue time waiting for an ideal situation??
couldn't care less. i'm not playing a 30min game of noodle fighting.
Then why do you que up for a 30min game of noodle fighting?
You don't want to waste 30 minutes in a game but are willing to wait 2 hours because of dodging?
cause not everybody is retarded enough to give the enemy 4 tanks. oh w8 it's league they are.

You know 4 tanks can't do shit unless someone gave them a hypercarry?

All the games I've won were because the enemy had {{champion:421}} {{champion:223}} {{champion:14}} {{champion:266}} , it's so easy to snowball the early game.

Rek is pretty powerful early
So is TK. Sion can be good too, but they have to know what they are doing. Aatrox is aatroxious
It's just that with 4 melees they cant avoid getting punished, unless my whole team is melee as well (which never is because I always get Bard).
+1 for the pun

Enemy team for my most recent game had Shen, Tahm, Leona, Singed, bard. So much tank.

It would have been an issue if literally any damage dealer had built any sort of % penetration (LW, Void), but nah. Why does ADC thresh need Bonus Armor Penetration against an enemy team of full tanks with 200-300 Armor?

And I tried stating this fact multiple times during the game, to no avail.

Are you retarded? How dafuq is that ADC Thresh going to finish his IE powerspike if he has to invest gold in some shit-ass penetration item? He is there to do damage, not to penetrate anything  ~~except yo momma~~ 

Kappa.

Who were you playing?

> [{quoted}](name=GoatPope,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=jAQikIEZ,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2016-08-22T10:23:32.887+0000)
>
> wet noodle fight is the reality of game modes where you pick dumb champs with dumb team comps for fun. how about dont waste peoples queue time waiting for an ideal situation??

I dont understand why people say nemesis is supposed to be fun, you can literally be handed a garbage team. Then spend 20 minutes being unable to do anything.

Like all my teammates constantly giving the enemy first pick galio, then wondering why they gives us only ap champs. As they say, "Ha Galio is garbage"

The point is to make what you get work, not "oh look what we got is terrible and what they got is decent, f**k this"

No champion is truly bad; most are just situational or underplayed.

Well fuck me for having a black out at such an inconvenient time. 
Honestly, do you people think about your suggestions properly?

You don't deserve to have league installed if you are intentionally playing in conditions where a black out is even considered.

You shouldn't even be playing ANY game if you are living in those conditions. You know what you should be doing instead? TRYING TO BETTER YOUR CONDITIONS. 

Shut up with your petty excuses.
You have some serious anger issues. Looked at your post history, lmao you need some serious help. Nobody appreciates your permanent aggression.

the penalty for dodging (a second time) is 2 hours


That said, I still dodge regularly. but not because of the champ I got. Working with bad picks is the fun part. Rather, because someone on my team gives the enemy a good team comp. Like we're giving them all adc but then someone doesn't cooperate with us and gives them a tank. And the last guy gives a support. And now they have a legit teamcomp, defeating the purpose of the mode, and everyone else is angry at them. Dodge.
2 hours > 20 minutes... I don't get it?

> [{quoted}](name=LatetotheRace,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=jAQikIEZ,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2016-08-22T14:12:51.940+0000)
>
> 2 hours > 20 minutes... I don't get it?

Now that I understand you...
2 hours of being afk or playing a different game is much more enjoyable than 20 minutes of a boring slog.

Plus, even featured game modes have MMR. aka losing a lot is going to increase my chances of being paired up with troll teammates again.
But in the end, after getting cooperative teammates only twice out of about 10 attempts---including 5 dodges and playing out 3 awful inevitable loss games---I gave up and played ARAM instead.

hm? what do you mean?

oh, sorry, the penalty for dodging _a second time_ is 2 hours. the first dodge is a normal penalty. edited

He's saying just tough it out and surrender at 20, that way you can play in 20 minutes instead of 2 hours. The problem with this is that very rarely does an entire team want to surrender, and it only takes 40% of the team to deny a surrender vote instead of the majority.

oh, I see
thanks
i mean unless you have to go cause of an emergency
Meh maybe they're just bored of playing 5 v 5 supports every fkn game

> [{quoted}](name=redfeenix,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=jAQikIEZ,comment-id=000b,timestamp=2016-08-22T17:17:34.369+0000)
>
> Meh maybe they're just bored of playing 5 v 5 supports every fkn game

THIS! It gets very boring getting Soraka or Nami every game

I dodged accidentally for the first time ever in LoL. It was Nemesis Draft and I was picked Kalista, so I went to check her abilities and stuff. Then I forgot to pick them a champion. Yeah, my bad, but it can be quite confusing since you're used to be ready once you self have a champion above your summoner name :S
How did that happen? When it's your turn to pick, the league screen will automatically pop up if you're looking at a different screen. I do it all the time.
Not in blind...

That's true, but this wasn't blind pick, it was nemesis draft, which has the same champ select style as draft pick in the sense that you take turns getting a champ instead of everyone picking a champ at the same time.
Oh, you're right, mb
Honestly it pops up sometimes but sometimes it doesn't. I've missed many a queue because of this.
Oh, and you can get 2 HOUR long penalty queue time
What if my friend gets online while I'm in queue, and I want to play with her? Am I not allowed to jump for fear of being permanently blocked from Nemesis?
Nah. I'll do what I want. Not playing Shitty boring supports every game.

Not all people that dodge do it because they don't want to use the champion.  while it is the case often, there are many instances where clients can crash, friends log on that you want to play with, or you just realize that you don't have time for a full game.
I main ap supports, I never don't get my mains. it's awesome.
I only get upset in nemesis when people do things that aren't based on champs. like face checking and then they claim its because they don't play the champ.

Its like this on All for One, half an hour to find a game cuz everyone dodges when their pick isn't chosen because it's stupid. Then the only game that isn't being dodged is when you're matched with a 3-4 man premade and they force their nomination onto you because the majority wins. It's frsutrating as hell. But no the dodging penalty is large enough, some people have legit reasons and I'd rather them dodge than just AFK.
I dodge nemesis if they give me anything with fur, or anything weebed out. Then I get on another account and instantly requeue. :)

how about we ban the people that troll their own teams who cause the dodges?

No im not going to play as 5 supports vs jhin/kled/reksai/janna/viktor because my team had a premade and thoguht it was funny to give them a real team.
Yeah, i queued up and someone else dodged, i got a 15 min wait before i could queue up again. Shits broken man.
I've never been so happy to play AP Alistar or ADC Thresh.
What's nemesis mode? Are you talking about that Support Draft Mode?
